title: Tom Bilyeu AMA on Hacking Your Brain Chemistry For Extreme Focus
description: Tom Bilyeu does a rapid fire AMA (ask me anything) inspired by a recent Facebook post. Topics include: *Practical tips on how to stay focused in a world of distractions *How to hack your brain chemistry for focus *Manipulating your brain chemistry to tap into the 20% *Steps to become a freelance writer *Why Tom chooses not to have kids *How to build an audience for your idea *And more...
